Package org.odk.collect.android.widgets

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BaseImageWidget.ExternalImageCaptureHandler
    Interface for choosing or capturing a new image
    BaseImageWidget.ImageClickHandler
    Interface for Clicking on Images
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotateWidget
    Image widget that supports annotations on the image.
    ArbitraryFileWidget  
    AudioWidget
    Widget that allows user to take pictures, sounds or video and add them to the form.
    BarcodeWidget
    Widget that allows user to scan barcodes and add them to the form.
    BaseArbitraryFileWidget  
    BaseImageWidget  
    BearingWidget
    BearingWidget is the widget that allows the user to get a compass heading.
    DateTimeWidget
    Displays a DatePicker widget.
    DateWidget  
    DecimalWidget
    A widget that restricts values to floating point numbers.
    DrawWidget
    Free drawing widget.
    ExArbitraryFileWidget  
    ExAudioWidget  
    ExDecimalWidget
    Launch an external app to supply a decimal value.
    ExImageWidget  
    ExIntegerWidget
    Launch an external app to supply an integer value.
    ExPrinterWidget
    Use the ODK Sensors framework to print data to a connected printer.
    ExStringWidget
    Launch an external app to supply a string value.
    ExVideoWidget  
    GeoPointMapWidget  
    GeoPointWidget  
    GeoShapeWidget  
    GeoTraceWidget
    GeoTraceWidget allows the user to collect a trace of GPS points as the device moves along a path.
    ImageWidget
    Widget that allows user to take pictures, sounds or video and add them to the form.
    IntegerWidget
    Widget that restricts values to integers.
    OSMWidget
    Widget that allows the user to launch OpenMapKit to get an OSM Feature with a predetermined set of tags that are edited in the application.
    QuestionWidget  
    RangeDecimalWidget  
    RangeIntegerWidget  
    RangePickerDecimalWidget  
    RangePickerIntegerWidget  
    RatingWidget  
    SignatureWidget
    Signature widget.
    StringNumberWidget
    Widget that restricts values to integers.
    StringWidget
    The most basic widget that allows for entry of any text.
    TimeWidget  
    TriggerWidget  
    UrlWidget  
    VideoWidget
    Widget that allows user to take pictures, sounds or video and add them to the form.
    WidgetFactory
    Convenience class that handles creation of widgets.
